message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $11,500. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate your enthusiasm. While $11,500 is a good starting point, I'm looking to spend a bit less. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. Let me know what you think.

Hi Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11,000. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
Alice, I appreciate you meeting me halfway. However, I'm still hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $10,750. This is a fair price for both of us, and I believe we can reach an agreement.

Hi Bob! I understand you're still looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,750. I'm willing to compromise and offer the product to you for $11,200. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product!
